CYCLO.WELCOME:
Like the Cyclosportives IRL, we offer you the opportunity to participate every Sunday morning in a Cyclo on Zwift, lasting around 2 hours and 75km, with classification.
 During these courses, we will explore diverse and varied courses, regularly hilly.
 All the runners register for the single category E and leave together, level groups will probably be created during the different difficulties of the course.
 Only a scratch classification will be carried out for each category: No FAL/FTS bonus or ranking by level or age category.
Power-Ups are activated.
